verses.name: Genesis 27:23
verses.text: And he discerned him not, because his hands were hairy, as his brother Esau’s hands: so he blessed him.

verses.name: Genesis 27:24
verses.text: And he said, Art thou my very son Esau? And he said, I am.

verses.name: Genesis 27:25
verses.text: And he said, Bring it near to me, and I will eat of my son’s venison, that my soul may bless thee. And he brought it near to him, and he did eat: and he brought him wine, and he drank.

verses.name: Genesis 27:26
verses.text: And his father Isaac said unto him, Come near now, and kiss me, my son.
